title: A Career in hotels and restaurants
brief_description: The hotel and restaurant business as a career: a visit by two young people to a hotel where the manager greets them and shows them all the departments, explaining the background for every job and the prospects for entrants. Encourages school leavers to ask if they too can visit a local hotel and look behind the scenes.
